subject: Re: EVP Analysis Request
author: therealrobstone
full_text:
Thanks for the analysis, Misty. It was one of strangest things I have 
caught on EVP. We also had a wireless microphone in the room which did 
not pick up the "whisper". So it was definitely centered on the 
digital voice recorder, which was sitting on a dresser during that 
particular time.

Regards,

Rob Stone
In Nomine Paranormal Research
Fort Wayne, Indiana

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
>
> Rob,
> 
> Not sure but I definitely hear a whispery voice behind the person 
speaking. Not sure what they say there tho it could even be your name 
LOL
> 
> rob rob
> drop drop
> fu** up
> 
> Cant tell because of the speech level of the voice tho it does sound 
to be close in proximity to the mic. 
> 
> Misty
> 
> --- On Wed, 9/17/08, therealrobstone <therealrobstone@...> wrote:
> 
> > From: therealrobstone <therealrobstone@...>
> > Subject: [EVP-ITC] EVP Analysis Request
> > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> > Date: Wednesday, September 17, 2008, 2:36 PM
> > I am new to the group and have an EVP I want an opinion on.
> > The file is 
> > posted on the folder ROB STONE'S FILES. Not sure what
> > the "voice" is.
> > 
> > If anyone has time to take a listen I would greatly
> > appreciate it.
> > 
> > Thanks for your help.
> > 
> > Regards,
> > 
> > Rob Stone
> > In Nomine Paranormal Research
> > Fort Wayne, Indiana
>
